page.title: 03 The People of Rushden
page.content: We did a survey asking people questions, so we could find out how people live in Rushden. We found that many houses were old; over 70 years. A lot of people seemed to have lived in Rushden for a long time. Most people preferred shopping in Rushden, though they visited Bedford, Wellingborough and Northampton, at times; few used Kettering. They liked Rushden because they found it cheaper and nearer. A lot of people used the corner shops because they were convenient, although expensive; so we visited the shops to find out about them. Nearly all opened 7 days a week, most between 7.00 a.m. and 8.00 p.m., some till 10.00 p.m. with 2-5 assistants. The slackest time of the day was from 1.30 p.m. - 3.00 p.m. Most people that visited the shops were known by the the shop owner.
